title: Digital Garden Client & API
description: Simple personal website used to blog about dev projects, and other things that are on my mind.
tech: Node.js • Express • PostgreSQL • Sequelize • TypeScript • Vue3 • Piñia

title: Collager
description: Collager is a simple tool for digital collaging. It connects with the Unsplash API to help collagers collect photos to work with.

title: MarketEdge
description: Data dashboard for B2G companies to track active RFP procurement opportunities and other vital information for their sales & marketing efforts. Link below links to a marketing website for the MarketEdge application, as the application itself is a paid product.

title: The Atlas
description: LinkedIn style community for local government officials to connect and share resources. Includes posting functionality, private messaging, and case study article creator/editor and viewer.
tech: Vue + Options API • Nuxt • TypeScript • Vuex • Cypress
